attributes.action: The Government should give the NHS additional funds as a matter of urgency.
attributes.background: The NHS is in crisis. A lack hospital beds has resulted in patients being treated in ambulances in car parks and in hospital corridors. Cancer units are considering cutting services. Staff are overwhelmed. Urgent funding is needed ASAP.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You may wish to sign one of these petitions instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/208864 or https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/203624

Otherwise, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
